"Congressman Mike Pence is humbled by the encouragement he has received across Indiana and the country to seek higher office," spokesman Matt Lloyd said. He will continue to prayerfully consider counsel. Mike Pence , who represents the state's 6th district, also is widely mentioned as a candidate for Indiana governor, a post Sarah Palin Mitch Daniels must vacate at the end of his term because of term limits.
